articles.description: Strictly Come Dancing favourite Karen Hauer looked beautiful at her wedding to Jordan Wyn-Jones, during which she wore a handmade gown, and co-star Luba Musktuk was her bridesmaid.
articles.content:
Strictly Come Dancing star Karen Hauer walked down the aisle in a fairytale dress to marry "love of my life" Jordan Wyn-Jones during an intimate countryside ceremony.
